title: How to deal with toxic teams
body: hi guys its not my first time i get report by teams in game...today i got 25 game chat restriction for not flame i can even post my game chat log here..i said stfu or noob sometimes but not said any other bad words as they told me and i have pictures of a team who want jungle role for their teamates i said i play jungle and they told me that they gonna report me 4x report and they told nothing in game idk if you can watch lobby chat or no .. idk how to deal with it i went lvl30 yesterday i dont wanna have this before ranked or not playing so much ... sorry about my bad english and thanks for help

replies.body:
More than one report in a game is treated the same as one report and reports are checked for integrity before being counted, so don't worry about troll reports and groups.

Cursing really doesn't have much to do with being banned. Extreme cases such as the N word are exceptions, but in most cases it isn't the word that gets you in trouble its the message. If you are constantly showing negative behavior it doesn't matter what words you use.

I would suggest that if you are not planning on saying something constructive, such as offering a solution to an issue, or nice, such as congratulating people on nice plays, then just keep it to yourself. Don't reply to negativity unless you can do it with positivity.
Thanks for your reply.. if i mute everyone all games and not talk with players is thats gonna clear my report history and go back as clear account?

This was a long time coming. I believe the first is a 10 game chat restriction to clean up your act but if you keep up with the toxic chatting it gets upped to 25. Your looking at time bans next. Clean up your attitude. /mute all if need be or even drag your chat off screen.
I know i went from 10 game chat restriction that was my bad but this 25 game is not my bad .. if i dont talk and mute everyone its normal and no one gonna report me for this?

You cannot be reported for being silent. If they report you for toxic chat speak, harassment, or homophobic/racial words the system will see that you didn't even say a word and those report are canceled out. You can be reported for afking and intentionally feeding but those have to make it obvious that you were going that. Like running down mid 30 times. As long as you just try your best and help your team, you won't receive any punishments c:

I also want to give you a link that states clearly what is breaking the rules and what is not breaking the rules. i hope this helps out with any questions. [Click Me!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player)

You need to be careful in league now you can get chat restrictions/bans even if you don't swear or do anything really bad if you just type too much you will get in trouble. Just a tip if you are ever being trolled or a victim of grief just bite your tongue and let them win cause Riot gives them the power of never getting in trouble as long as their chat is clean.
